title: Cycle #63
content:
We recieved 1.68114300 BTC. The usual wrapping service wrapped.com was not available. Therefore, we used letsexchange.io:

1.67500000 converted to 79,359.498472 STX

29,944.317395 STX were distributed to 783 pool members. The memo says “reward cycle #64 payout”, but it is actually for cycle #63.
49,415.180707 STX were distributed to City Coin stackers (NYC: 29,773.591836 STX and MIA: 19,641.588871 STX).

With a total locked amount of 41,287,199.907396 STX the rewards are 0.19%.
